title: Can we expect big visual updates on the mage rework?
body:
For example, I think cass has great potential with her Siren skin, I think it could have water particles, a better "mermaid" model, recall, and a prettier splash art. Desperada could have sand particles and stuff, her E could be like gunshots. Just wondering... 
Thanks!

replies.body: The mage changes will all be gameplay updates. There'll be some changes to how spell effects, character animations etc look where ability functionality has changed, as with the Marksman changes last year they're not visual updates though.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rwlMgEdo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:29:50.050+0000)
>
> The mage changes will all be gameplay updates. There'll be some changes to how spell effects, character animations etc look where ability functionality has changed, as with the Marksman changes last year they're not visual updates though.

Will there be texture updates at least?

Zyra needs one imo, she kinda looks like plastic right now.
Zyra will have a texture update to her base only (and her base plants)

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rwlMgEdo,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-04-05T23:22:04.622+0000)
>
> Zyra will have a texture update to her base only (and her base plants)


Why isnt Wildfire Zyra a candidate for a small TU? Her current orange colour is a bit distracting since the new Summoners Rift imo

A TU for Zyra takes quite a bit of time as she also has all those plant asset. We have pretty limited art resources for the roster projects and had to choose between only base Zyra or nothing at all. We chose to at least update base Zyra.
On ZyraÂ´s MYMU promopage her E has pink-redish textures. However, they are green on PBE. Which colour is intended?

I'm sorry to pop in to post an off-topic question, but does this mean that Xerath won't get upgraded visuals/animations for his ult? 
Sorry again!

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rwlMgEdo,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-04-05T23:22:04.622+0000)
>
> Zyra will have a texture update to her base only (and her base plants)

Okay, thank you!

Cassiopeia desperately needs to receive an actual VU, the update from 2014 merely changed her textures and voiceover. Meanwhile all of her assets are still from 2010 (animations, basemodel, ability icons, etc.), the Mage Update *needs* to address this.

She's also in dire need of a lore update. Her current backgroundstory only conists of 3-4 lines of text, and that's it. There's so much you've yet to do for this champion, not to forget that she hasn't seen a new skin in over 3 years (!).

Hey!

Another thing people would probably want to know is is there a VU schedule available? As in, which champions are getting VUs and in what order?

Thanks.

There is one
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule

It does not necessarily represent whats next though.
please tell me you fix ryze so he isnt a weakling useless champion.
He's either useless, or op and must be nurfed. Depending on the player...

Cass and Vlad are both good candidates for VU's, and the fact that Riot doesn't even do VU's right now without a gameplay update makes this a missed opportunity IMO. 

Maybe they'll get VU's in ~3 years when they get reworked again.
They have said no. Expect some minor particle effects for updated abilities and such, but no VUs
